name: TopShot: Darkness
description:
1v1 Multiplayer Top-down shooter game played against other player or an AI in symmetrical square map that is illuminated by light posts. Players can shoot at light posts to make that area of the map dark to hide. 1 shot is enough to kill a player, making the sounds vital for this game in order to survive. After some time lasers come from all sides towards the center of the map, shrinking the gameplay area to force players to meet and fight!Key Features
  • Leaderboards
  • Achievements
  • Invite Steam friend to play together
  • 4 Different AI difficulties
  • In-game chat
  • Push to talk voice chat
